nodes.docs: Represents the completion of an asynchronous operation

nodes.text: (method) PromiseConstructor.all<[Promise<bigint>, Promise<bigint>, Promise<GetEnsNameReturnType>]>(values: [Promise<bigint>, Promise<bigint>, Promise<GetEnsNameReturnType>]): Promise<[bigint, bigint, GetEnsNameReturnType]> (+1 overload)
nodes.docs:
Creates a Promise that is resolved with an array of results when all of the provided Promises
resolve, or rejected when any Promise is rejected.

Returns the number of the most recent block seen.

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/actions/public/getBlockNumber
- Examples: https://stackblitz.com/github/wevm/viem/tree/main/examples/blocks_fetching-blocks
- JSON-RPC Methods: [`eth_blockNumber`](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/apis/json-rpc/#eth_blocknumber)
tags: The number of the block. {@link GetBlockNumberReturnType}

nodes.docs:
Returns the balance of an address in wei.

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/actions/public/getBalance
- JSON-RPC Methods: [`eth_getBalance`](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/apis/json-rpc/#eth_getbalance)
tags: The balance of the address in wei. {@link GetBalanceReturnType}

nodes.docs:
Gets primary name for specified address.

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/ens/actions/getEnsName
- Examples: https://stackblitz.com/github/wevm/viem/tree/main/examples/ens
tags: Calls `reverse(bytes)` on ENS Universal Resolver Contract to "reverse resolve" the address to the primary ENS name.
Name or `null` if not found. {@link GetEnsNameReturnType}

nodes.docs: Address to get ENS name for.
